definition: lit. to cut all at one stroke (idiom); to impose uniformity/one solution fits a diversity of problems/one size fits all
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
surname Dao
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to cut/to slice/tangent (math)

sentences.english: One size fits all so for adjustment there is a rear Velcro strap.
sentences.chinese: 一刀切的調整，以便有一個後方尼龍搭扣帶。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new algorithm for the two-dimensional guillotine rectangular stock cutting optimization (GRSCO) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的二維一刀切矩形優化排料算法。

sentences.english: The oil-pan gasket fits between the oil pan and bottom pf the engine block.
sentences.chinese: 石油潘墊片一刀切之間油底殼和底部酚醛引擎座。

sentences.english: I can either pay for you time hourly or set a straight across the board fee.
sentences.chinese: 本人可以爲你付出時間每小時或設置一刀切費直。

sentences.english: We would be sceptical to any broad-brush solution.
sentences.chinese: 我們對任何一刀切的解決方案表示懷疑。

definition: to overcorrect (idiom)/to overcompensate
lit. not eating for fear of choking (idiom); fig. to cut off one's nose to spite one's face/to avoid sth essential because of a slight risk
a dike breaks/fig. to provide facilities (for evil deeds)/to open the floodgates
policy/CL:個|个[ge4]
to treat the symptoms/reactive (rather than proactive)
to treat the symptoms rather than getting to the root of the problem (proverb)/reactive (rather than proactive)
pinyin: tou2 tong4 yi1 tou2 , jiao3 tong4 yi1 jiao3

definition: to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
to increase bit by bit/repeated increments
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
solve one problem only to find another cropping up
pinyin: an4 xia4 hu2 lu2 fu2 qi3 piao2

definition: local policy/regional regulations
egalitarianism
The higher ups have policies while the lower downs have their own ways of getting around them. (idiom)
pinyin: shang4 you3 zheng4 ce4 , xia4 you3 dui4 ce4

definition: lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task

definition: see 竭澤而漁|竭泽而渔[jie2 ze2 er2 yu2]
